name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-tailwindcss3
title: Tailwind 3
shortDescription: This project showcases an integration of Tailwind CSS into an SPFx project.
longDescription: This project showcases an integration of Tailwind CSS into an SPFx project. It offers a sample implementation, facilitating straightforward setup and utilization of Tailwind CSS for enhanced styling and design in SharePoint Framework projects.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
